sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STOW, the name of a market-town in Glouceſter- ſhire in England, ſituated in W. Long. 1. 50. N. Lat. 51. 54. It is alſo the name of a fine ſeat of the Marquis of Buckingham in Buckinghamſhire. Here are the best gardens in England, adorned with buffs, ſtatues, obeliſks, pavilions, and temples. It is two miles from the town of Buckingham.
